    (package private) void
    searchItems(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Search Item records for matching id or title based on user input If user input is a numeric value the function will request an ID search, if user input is a string the function will request a Title search

    • searchItems

      void searchItems(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Search Item records for matching id or title based on user input If user input is a numeric value the function will request an ID search, if user input is a string the function will request a Title search
      Parameters:
      event - unused
